name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Engineer with over 13 years of experience in software development, specializing in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **React**, and **Next.js** for high-performance application delivery across healthcare and financial sectors. Expertise in **CI/CD** practices and deploying solutions on **AWS**, ensuring robust product architecture and high code quality.
Demonstrated ability to design and implement scalable software solutions while utilizing collaborative and effective communication skills. Proven track record in building AI/ML-powered platforms, applying predictive analytics, automation, and real-time data processing effectively. Strong foundation in compliance-driven development aligning systems with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards.

Implemented CI/CD practices through **GitHub Actions** and **CircleCI**, facilitating seamless deployment workflows and ensuring high **Code Quality** across all stages of development.
Designed and executed responsive UI components with **Next.js** to enhance user engagement and streamline communication, significantly improving user experience.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to define project requirements and share insights, leveraging strong **Communication Skills** to foster an environment of teamwork and innovation.
Spearheaded the creation of CI/CD pipelines using **Fastlane** and **App Center**, resulting in a **40% reduction** in deployment times and minimal downtime.
Transformed legacy systems into microservices using **Docker** and **Kubernetes (EKS)**, achieving a **50% increase** in application scalability and maintainability.
Built and maintained comprehensive data solutions with **PostgreSQL** and **MongoDB**, supporting rapid data ingestion and analytics, leading to a **30% improvement** in data processing speed.
Integrated real-time analytics features using **Chart.js** and **Power BI Embedded**, which enhanced reporting efficiency and provided actionable insights to stakeholders.
Employed advanced testing strategies utilizing **Jest** and **Cypress**, ensuring code stability and reliability while reducing bug rates by **25%** before production release.
Developed and maintained security protocols conforming to industry standards including **AWS**, reinforcing data integrity and protecting sensitive information across platforms.

Utilized **Javascript** and **Typescript** to create interactive and responsive front-end applications with **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, and **Next.js**, promoting best practices in software development and code quality.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines to streamline deployment processes, enhancing product architecture through efficient deployment strategies across cloud platforms such as **AWS**.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure clear communication and alignment on project objectives, delivering solutions that meet business needs effectively.
Modernized core financial platforms by migrating to microservices architecture with **Node.js (NestJS/Express)** and **Python (FastAPI, Django)**, improving system performance by over **30%** for high-volume transactions.
Designed and deployed a robust event-driven architecture using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, ensuring seamless communication and processing across critical workflows.
Built and managed real-time analytics dashboards with **D3.js** and **Power BI Embedded**, providing real-time insights into operational metrics and improving decision-making speed by **25%**.
Developed and optimized ETL pipelines for financial data ingestion from various sources using **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Data Factory**, facilitating both batch and real-time data processing for enhanced operational efficiency.
Created and deployed machine learning models for fraud detection with **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, enhancing fraud detection capabilities to identify suspicious activities, reducing false positives by **15%**.
Designed ML pipelines for real-time credit scoring and churn prediction, integrating predictive modeling into backend services using **MLflow** and **Airflow**.

- Implemented scalable, efficient frontend applications leveraging **Next.js** to enhance SEO and ensure mobile-first engagement, resulting in a **30%** increase in site traffic.

- Ensured adherence to software development best practices and code quality standards, leading to a **25%** decrease in post-deployment issues and improved maintainability.
- Played a pivotal role in the architecture and design of product solutions, effectively collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-impact features.
- Leveraged **AWS** for cloud services, improving application scalability and reliability in various deployment scenarios.
- Actively participated in code reviews and offered constructive feedback, fostering a culture of collaboration and continuous improvement within the engineering team.
- Maintained effective communication with stakeholders to understand requirements and provide updates on project progress, ensuring alignment with business objectives.
- Led discussions on product architecture, driving technical decision-making to address performance and scalability challenges, and advocated for best practices in code quality and documentation.
